  +
[[Image:Mediafire - uploading.png|thumb|400px|the upload screen of Mediafire]]
'''MediaFire''' is a free file and image [[one-click hosting|hosting web site]] located in Harris County, [[Texas]], [[USA]]. It has received much attention because it has rather few limitations for users without an account compared to many other file hosters. The domain ''mediafire.com'' attracted at least 8.7 million visitors annually by 2008 according to a [[Compete.com]] study.<ref>[http://siteanalytics.compete.com/mediafire.com?metric=uv Mediafire attracts almost 9m visitors online yearly]</ref>
'''MediaFire''' is a free file and image [[one-click hosting|hosting web site]] located in Harris County, [[Texas]], [[USA]]. It has received much attention because it has rather few limitations for users without an account compared to many other file hosters. The domain ''mediafire.com'' attracted at least 8.7 million visitors annually by 2008 according to a [[Compete.com]] study.<ref>[http://siteanalytics.compete.com/mediafire.com?metric=uv Mediafire attracts almost 9m visitors online yearly]</ref>
